name: Triceps Kickback
setup: Stand in a staggered stance or use a bench for support
Hinge torso forward ~30–45° with neutral spine
Hold a dumbbell, elbow bent 90°, upper arm parallel to torso
steps: Exhale as you extend the elbow, pushing the dumbbell back until arm is straight (not hyperextended)
Briefly squeeze triceps at full extension
Inhale while controlling the return to 90° elbow bend (no swing)
safety: Use strict form with lighter load; protect lower back with light brace. If shoulder discomfort, reduce range or use cable.

progressions: Add band around wrists for tension

prescriptionHints.notes: Prioritize elbow isolation; stop if shoulder swings.

joints.notes: Maintain light core brace and neutral spine.
